Package me.neo.randomtwistcore.api.twists

Class ItemTwist

java.lang.Object
me.neo.randomtwistcore.api.twists.Twist
me.neo.randomtwistcore.api.twists.ItemTwist
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public abstract class ItemTwist extends Twist
An extension of Twist that is used to make twists containing a custom item.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack
    customItem
    An ItemStack that represents the item that this twist revolves around.
    protected org.bukkit.inventory.ShapedRecipe
    customRecipe
    A ShapedRecipe that represents the recipe of the customItem.
    protected boolean
    grantItemOnBind
    A boolean representing if the customItem is automatically granted when a Player is bound to this twist.

    boundPlayers, description, id, name, twistNames, twists

    • check

      protected boolean check(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack)
      Checks if the given ItemStack is the custom item.
      Parameters:
      stack - The ItemStack to compare to
      Returns:
      True if it is the custom item. False otherwise.

    • check

      protected boolean check(String displayName)
      Checks if the display name is the custom item's display name. This method is less reliable than the ItemStack method. Only use this method if the properties of the ItemStack are compromised.
      Parameters:
      displayName - The display name of the item to check.
      Returns:
      True if it is the custom item. False otherwise.
